definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

orpiment/arsenic trisulfide As2S3/make changes in writing/malign/criticize without grounds

to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
